location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Richard Thomas Goodwin, Secretary and Translator to the Office of Country Correspondence, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledges the receipt of Richard Thomas Goodwin's communication, dated 15 February, which enclosed two letters from the Honourable Governor, Mountstuart Elphinstone, addressed to His Royal Highness Hossain Ali Meerza [Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mīrzā] and Shaik Abdol Russool [Shaikh ‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān, Governor of Bushire] respectively. Bruce reports that the letters were sent to their addresses this morning.
